channel.title: Ace of spades [FREE GAME]
channel.description:
last night i came across a game. [url=http://www.ace-spades.com/]http://www.ace-spades.com/[/url] Some things about this game: It is a FPS in a voxel world (like minecraft) your only goal is to capture the enemys flag 3 times. The game is multiplayer only, but it is not hard to find a server with 30+ people in it. Currently it is only BETA 0.22 so its hardly refined. the graphics are abit iffy, but the gameplay is AWESOME.
I will probably post a few screenshots and a gameplay video later on when i have the time :P
(please dont reply with comments like "MINECRAFT RIP" and stuff like that, as it not about building, but making trenches and staying alive)

item.title: Ace of spades [FREE GAME]
item.dc:creator: @_SITTION |SITTION|
item.description:
@_SITTION wrote:

The reason, i love this game is because Its strategy, u can dig and make bunkers etc me and a friend are always teamin up making a underground base near the blue team [ green ftw ] and owning some noobs.

Read full topic

item.title: Ace of spades [FREE GAME]
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

Alot of features are not implemented in the game yet (sadly) but since it is in early beta it still has allot of development left.
the thing that makes this game fun for me is the strategy required to capture the Intel, its not one of these games that you can just run in and grab the flag and waltz out…
you actually have to plan what you are going to to, then put that plan into action, weather it is a huge tunnel system to the enemy’s base or building multiple forts and pushing the opponents back until you are overpowering them with your guns…
I LOVE THIS GAME
(not as much as minecraft tho)

Read full topic

item.title: Ace of spades [FREE GAME]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It’s actually not that bad. Yeah, it has a lot of development to go through yet but as a game I really am intrigued by the concept. I’d love to know how to change the controls (If available yet).

Read full topic

item.title: Ace of spades [FREE GAME]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Shrogg, I’ve been playing this for like 5 days. And I told you that because now like 50 more people are going to play the game.
Heads up to anyone who plays the game

Memes include : Green is superior race
Blue is for autistic fags who like minecraft

Also, the game has hackers. Aim for there head. keep in mind you rifle is not bolt action, but infact semi auto.
Pickaxes collect blocks, shovels brake 3 at once. You can either choose the blocks color (arrow keys) or make it fit the surrounding environment (right click the block you want it to be)
You have 2 grenades.
M = map
T = talk
Y = team chat.

Read full topic

item.title: Ace of spades [FREE GAME]
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

I find its more fun than COD because it involves alot of strategy.

reyx7:

Damnit why’d you post this. Wait till it’s more stable, then tell the public.

I know it may not look very complete/stable but it is a great game. and it is really fun, you shold try it out (if you havent allready?)
and its only a 3MB download

Read full topic
